x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying polygonvertex x-locations

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vectorof values containing a "b" combined with a numeric value specifyingpolygon vertex y-locations

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x} or \code{y} are only given as numeric vectors

linecolor.description: A character value specifying polygon line color

lwd.description: A numeric specifying polygon line width

lty.description: A numeric specifying polygon line type

fill.description: A character value specifying polygon fill color

id.description: A numeric vector used to separate locations in \code{x} and\code{y} into multiple polygons

id.lengths.description: A numeric vector used to separate locations in\code{x} and \code{y} into multiple polygons

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
